greeting: Hello! Welcome to Food Finder YYC 🍎. I can help you find food resources in Calgary.

askDay.text:
🕛 Are you looking for today or tomorrow?

Reply "1" for Today
Reply "2" for Tomorrow

askLocationType.text:
📍 I need to figure out where you are so I can give you the closest locations. How would you like to tell me?

"1" Address
"2" Intersection
"3" Closest Public or Catholic School

askAddress.errorFormat: ❌ I didn't find "%s". Check your address or try a different method.

askIntersection1.text: 🚥 What is the name (eg. Kensington Rd) or number (eg. 14 St) of the first street?

askIntersection2.text: 🚥 What is the name (eg. Kensington Rd) or number (eg. 14 St) of the second street?
askIntersection2.errorFormat: ❌ I didn't find the intersection of "%s" and "%s". Check the street names or try a different method.

askPlace.text: 🚸 What is the name of the school closest to you? (example: Alex Munro)
askPlace.errorFormat: ❌ I didn't recognize "%s". Check the school name or try a different method.

closing.results: ✅ Here are the closest locations to %s %s:
closing.noResults: We didn't find any available locations. Please try again later or call 211 for a referral to local meal programs.
closing.goodbye: I’m available to help all summer - add my number to your contacts. Have a great day 😎!

timeout: The conversation has timed out. Please start again.
